attributes.action: Allow motor bikes to use the bus lanes in cities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bikes are a good means of transport and are certainly better than cars in terms of carbon footprint. It would make sense to allow bikes to use the bus lanes, especially in London where congestion by other road users is heavy. This would encourage more bike users and add to the smooth flow of traffic in cities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
